# Currently Available

Here are the currently available modules for using the BioDIGS data.

[Exploring Soil Data](https://hutchdatascience.org/GDSCN_BioDIGS_Soil/): explore the abiotic soil characteristics using the tidyverse in R

# Coming Soon

Antimicrobial Resistance: examine microbial data for evidence of antimicrobial resistance genes using ABRIcate on Galaxy. 

Biosynthetic Gene Clusters: identify biosynthetic gene clusters in microbiome data using antiSMASH on Galaxy.
